timelines.description:
11bdrum = base drum - have to re-trigger here and there to stop follow on drift tdrum = tom tom pulse-1&2 ok cireleSet : sends the parameters for the circle circleSeq : sequences the circle over time.
*MIDI MAP PCR : vol (key 1) bird (key2) pulse(3)
